title: TAKE OFF (feat. Blake Webber)
lyrics:
Hello and welcome to this lit ass flight
Federal law requires compliance with all
signs, placards and crew member instructions
To fasten your seatbelts put the down buckle
inside the other buckle

You probably do this everyday in your vehicle

It's no different on a plane

To tie it just pull that strap

Your seatbelt should be light across your hips

Are you ready for take-off?



Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

We're about to get airborne bitch



Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off



Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

It's time to fuckin' take-off bitch



Bitch



Are you ready for take-off



Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off



Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

It's time to fuckin' take-off bitch



We're about to experience some turbulence



Are you ready for take-off



Take-off

Take-off

Take-off

Take-off



Alright, thanks for flying with us on this lovely day

If you'd like to apply for a sky miles card please see a flight attendant

Otherwise have a nice evening
